ygData.subject: Re: ack!
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  I am new to this, so plz no flames. :) Ok, I have noticed that when scanning the list of available spells, there is no real pattern besides
ygData.messageBody:
<snip>
>I don't want pets, you don't want lifetaps, so what
>other necro spells could we get instead? Buffs? That
>shrieking aura type damage shield? Don't just say "NO
>LIFETAP!", Beld, throw me a bone here, let's be
>constructive...
<snip>
I am new to this, so plz no flames. :)
Ok, I have noticed that when scanning the list of
available spells, there is no real pattern besides the
pets and the Darkness line. By that I mean you don't
see the entire line of spells.
I never use my pet and consider it a waste of bone chips.
Also Dark Empathy sucks. The amount of HPs transfered
is minimal at 22nd level to really make a difference. Or
am I wrong since I haven't reached that level yet?
I would like to see a line of spells if given be
progressed to the endlike the Darkness line.
ie. Disease Cloud, Aura Line, Damage Shields, Poison
Bolt Line, Undead DD and Charm spells. I would much
rather have a Charm Undead spell than a Pet spell.

Why not give SKs the ability to gate?
Level 22: Remove Dark Empathy
Enable Self Gate
Level 39: Remove Shield Skin (does it really do a
whole lot at that high a level? Does it even
absorb 1 hit from a creature? This goes on
the assumption that the site I visited had
good info: 100 HPs buff)
Enable Bind Affinity (at this level who would
be jealous?)

Just my thoughts.
If I am way of base, let me know, but I have no
experience with these higher spells and how well they
actually work solo or in group.

--
Cronik <Brethren of ill Omen>
Left Hand of Thule the Pain Bringer
14th Season Troll SK
Bertoxxulous

"Greenbloods jus be Froglok trick. Smash'm and dey
blood same color a Froglok. Me smash'm Greenblood
for Thule. Thule make Cronik big feared. Make
smash'm fun."
